title: Food Sharing Management
description: A full-stack web application where users can donate surplus food or request donations. The platform includes role-based dashboards for donors, receivers, and admins.
features: Food posting with status updates and expiration

title: Garden Tips Share
description: A community blog and forum for garden lovers to share tips, comment, and explore curated content. Includes a blog posting system with authentication and category filters.
features: Post garden tips, edit/delete your posts

title: Appstore
description: An online mobile app showcase platform where developers can upload apps, users can explore, and admins can manage submissions. Modern UI with Bootstrap styling.
features: Upload and categorize apps with screenshots
